alert.note: Alert for Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Western Payette National Forest (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 7:53AM MDT until September 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST OREGON AND SOUTHWEST IDAHO THROUGHOUT THE DAY TODAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR WESTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...EASTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...NORTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST...SOUTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST/WESTERN SAWTOOTH NATIONAL FOREST...OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 401...402...403...421...423... 636 AND 637... * WINDS...15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 40 mph. The strongest winds are expected to be over the higher terrain in the West Central Mountains in Idaho. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...5 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Western Payette National Forest
